title: Bizarre moment a naked man walks up the escalator at North Melbourne train station
text:
The bizarre moment a naked man casually walked up a escalator at an inner city train station has been caught on camera.

The man was spotted by a commuter who quickly captured the moment and posted it to Reddit.

The video, filmed from the platform, showed the exposed backside of the adult male as he calmly walked up an escalator at 11.45am today at North Melbourne train station.

The bizarre moment a naked man casually walked up a escalator at an inner city train station has been caught on camera (pictured)

A Metro Trains spokesperson explained the situation to Daily Mail Australia, detailing the strange moment staff offered him clothes.

'Staff initially saw the man on CCTV walking up the escalator to the concourse,' said a spokesperson.

'They did a welfare check to see if he was under the influence or showed any signs of illness - they offered him clothes - but he declined.'

A Metro Trains spokesperson explained the situation to Daily Mail Australia, detailing the strange moment staff offered the naked man clothes (pictured)

The spokesperson also noted the naked man showed no signs of aggression, and declined all assistance.

Police were called to the scene, but byt he time they arrived the man had wandered away.

Reddit users wasted no time expressing their confusion.

'Well that escalated quickly,' joked one user.

'I wonder where he keeps his Myki,' wondered someone else.

'Walk of shame?' asked another person, to which another replied, 'or pride?'

But another user had a more pressing issues on their mind.

'I wouldn't get on an escalator with my penis exposed. Like, there are too many things that can go wrong.'
description: North Melbourne train station staff offered the naked man clothes, but he declined.
authors: Charlotte Karp For Daily Mail Australia
